SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui
Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.cli

Class ChatWindow

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.cli.ChatWindow
public class ChatWindow extends Object
The ChatWindow class represents a chat interface with functionalities to display and manage chat messages.

  • Constructor Summary

    Description
    ChatWindow(int height, int width)
    Constructs a ChatWindow with specified height and width.

  • Constructor Details

    • ChatWindow

      public ChatWindow(int height, int width)
      Constructs a ChatWindow with specified height and width.
      Parameters:
      height - the number of lines the chat window can display
      width - the maximum number of characters per line

  • Method Details

    • clear

      public void clear()
      Clears the chat window.

    • showChat

      public void showChat(Set<String> privateChat, List<ChatMessage> messages)
      Displays the chat with specified private chat IDs and chat messages.
      Parameters:
      privateChat - the set of IDs for private chat
      messages - the list of chat messages

    • update

      public void update()
      Updates the chat window with the current messages.

    • getId

      public Set<String> getId()
      Gets the set of private chat IDs.
      Returns:
      the set of private chat IDs

    • newMessage

      public void newMessage(Set<String> chat)
      Handles the addition of a new message to the chat.
      Parameters:
      chat - the set of IDs for the new chat message

    • getLength

      public int getLength()
      Gets the number of lines currently in the chat window.
      Returns:
      the number of lines

    • getLine

      public String getLine(int index)
      Gets a specific line from the chat window by index.
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the line to retrieve
      Returns:
      the line at the specified index, or an empty string if the index is out of bounds
